code: @Manual{,   title = {whirl: Logging package},   author = {Aksel Thomsen and Lovemore Gakava and Cervan Girard and Kristian Troejelsgaard},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.3}, }

title: Logging package
text: whirl package provide functionalities executing scripts batch simultaneously getting log individual executions. log script execution many pharmaceutical companies GxP requirement, whirl package honors requirement generating log , among things, contains information : Status (script run error warnings) actual code Date time execution environment script executed (session info) Information packages versions utilized Environmental variables wrapped nicely formatted html document easy navigate.

title: Logging package
text: path argument run() currently supports single scripts, multiple scripts, folders, /config files ().

what: Left-align text and pad to same length. — align_left
title: Left-align text and pad to same length. — align_left
text: Left-align text pad length.

title: Left-align text and pad to same length. — align_left
code: align_left(   text,   width = max(nchar(text)),   type = c("non-trimmed", "trimmed"),   sep = " ",   keep.empty = TRUE )

title: Left-align text and pad to same length. — align_left
text: text character strings left-aligned. width numeric indicating desired length strings. type character specifying pre-processing. Trims whitespace text set "trimmed". sep character specifying padding. May give unexpected results single character. keep.empty logical Indicate empty strings kept empty.

title: Left-align text and pad to same length. — align_left
text: character left-aligned text.

title: whirl Options — options
text: Internally used, package-specific options. options prioritize R options() values, fall back environment variables undefined. neither option environment variable set, default value used.

title: whirl Options — options
text: Option values specific whirl can accessed passing package name env.

title: whirl Options — options
text: out_formats default: "html" option: whirl.out_formats envvar: R_WHIRL_OUT_FORMATS (evaluated possible, raw string otherwise) track_files default: FALSE option: whirl.track_files envvar: R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES (TRUE one 'TRUE', '1', FALSE otherwise) check_renv default: FALSE option: whirl.check_renv envvar: R_WHIRL_CHECK_RENV (TRUE one 'TRUE', '1', FALSE otherwise) track_files_discards default: c("^/lib", "^/etc", "^/lib64", "^/usr", "^/var", "^/opt", "^/sys",     "^/proc", "^/tmp", "^/null", "^/urandom", "^/.cache", .libPaths()) option: whirl.track_files_discards envvar: R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES_DISCARDS (character vector, split ';' delimiter) track_files_keep default: paste0("^", getwd()) option: whirl.track_files_keep envvar: R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES_KEEP (character vector, split ';' delimiter) verbosity_level default: "verbose" option: whirl.verbosity_level envvar: R_WHIRL_VERBOSITY_LEVEL (evaluated possible, raw string otherwise) approved_pkgs_folder default: NULL option: whirl.approved_pkgs_folder envvar: R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_FOLDER (character vector, split ';' delimiter) approved_pkgs_url default: NULL option: whirl.approved_pkgs_url envvar: R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_URL (character vector, split ';' delimiter)
code: "html" FALSE FALSE c("^/lib", "^/etc", "^/lib64", "^/usr", "^/var", "^/opt", "^/sys",     "^/proc", "^/tmp", "^/null", "^/urandom", "^/.cache", .libPaths()) paste0("^", getwd()) "verbose" NULL NULL

what: Internal reuse of options description — options_params
title: Internal reuse of options description — options_params
text: Internal reuse options description

title: Internal reuse of options description — options_params
text: verbosity_level chatty log ? Possibilities quiet, verbose, debug. (Defaults "verbose", overwritable using option 'whirl.verbosity_level' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_VERBOSITY_LEVEL') track_files_discards List file naming patterns tracked track_files = TRUE (Defaults c("^/lib", "^/etc", "^/lib64", "^/usr", "^/var", "^/opt", "^/sys", ;     "^/proc", "^/tmp", "^/null", "^/urandom", "^/.cache", .libPaths()), overwritable using option 'whirl.track_files_discards' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES_DISCARDS') track_files files read written tracked? Currently supported Linux. (Defaults FALSE, overwritable using option 'whirl.track_files' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES') out_formats log format(s) produce. Possiblities html, json, markdown formats:gfm, commonmark, markua. See also details. (Defaults "html", overwritable using option 'whirl.out_formats' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_OUT_FORMATS') approved_pkgs_folder Approved folder library packages (Defaults NULL, overwritable using option 'whirl.approved_pkgs_folder' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_FOLDER') check_renv projects renv status checked? (Defaults FALSE, overwritable using option 'whirl.check_renv' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_CHECK_RENV') track_files_keep List file naming patterns alway tracked track_files = TRUE (Defaults paste0("^", getwd()), overwritable using option 'whirl.track_files_keep' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES_KEEP') approved_pkgs_url Approved URL library packages (Defaults NULL, overwritable using option 'whirl.approved_pkgs_url' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_URL')

text: Execute single multiple R, R Markdown, Quarto scripts pointing directly file(s) pointing whirl config file

title: Execute single or multiple R, R Markdown, and Quarto scripts by pointing directly to the file(s) or by pointing to a whirl config file — run
code: run(   path,   log_dir = NULL,   steps = NULL,   parallel = TRUE,   num_cores = NULL,   summary_dir = "." )

title: Execute single or multiple R, R Markdown, and Quarto scripts by pointing directly to the file(s) or by pointing to a whirl config file — run
text: path character vector file path(s) R, R Markdown, Quarto scripts, folder(s), whirl config file. log_dir character string file path(s) specifying directories logs individual script(s) stored. one folder specified logs stored folder. multiple paths specified match number paths specified "paths" argument. steps optional argument can used certain steps within config files executed. equivalent names steps found config file. kept NULL (default) stpes listed config file wil lbe executed. parallel Logical; TRUE, scripts executed parallel. Default FALSE. summary log stored. num_cores Integer specifying number cores use parallel execution. NULL (default), use one less total number available cores. summary_dir character string specifying file path summary log stored.

title: Execute single or multiple R, R Markdown, and Quarto scripts by pointing directly to the file(s) or by pointing to a whirl config file — run
text: list containing execution results script. element list character string indicating success failure script execution.

code: run_script(   script,   track_files = options::opt("track_files", env = "whirl"),   check_renv = options::opt("check_renv", env = "whirl"),   out_formats = options::opt("out_formats", env = "whirl"),   approved_pkgs_folder = options::opt("approved_pkgs_folder", env = "whirl"),   approved_pkgs_url = options::opt("approved_pkgs_url", env = "whirl"),   out_dir = dirname(script) )

title: Run script test with a single script — run_script
text: script path track_files files read written tracked? Currently supported Linux. (Defaults FALSE, overwritable using option 'whirl.track_files' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_TRACK_FILES') check_renv projects renv status checked? (Defaults FALSE, overwritable using option 'whirl.check_renv' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_CHECK_RENV') out_formats log format(s) produce. Possiblities html, json, markdown formats:gfm, commonmark, markua. See also details. (Defaults "html", overwritable using option 'whirl.out_formats' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_OUT_FORMATS') approved_pkgs_folder Approved folder library packages (Defaults NULL, overwritable using option 'whirl.approved_pkgs_folder' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_FOLDER') approved_pkgs_url Approved URL library packages (Defaults NULL, overwritable using option 'whirl.approved_pkgs_url' environment variable 'R_WHIRL_APPROVED_PKGS_URL') out_dir description

title: whirl 0.0.3 (2024-08-26)
text: Initial commit run() wrapper run_script(), run_paths() run_by_config(). steps argument added run() allowing user select certain steps config file executed. Substituting spinner progress bar executing single scripts. Adjusting messages uniform regardless scripts executed whirl package

title: whirl 0.0.2
text: Update execution (including order execution) can controlled config file

title: whirl 0.0.1
text: First release internal package repository.
